nars.util.meter.event

Class PeriodMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.meter.FunctionMeter<java.lang.Double>
      • nars.util.meter.event.PeriodMeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Signals<java.lang.Double>

    public class PeriodMeter
extends FunctionMeter<java.lang.Double>
    Measures the period between hit() calls to determine frequency-related statistics of hit intervals. millisecond resolution performs better than nanoseconds but both are converted to a double value (nanosecond unixtime) for calculation. the results can be returned either as period duration (sec) or frequency (1/period).
    See Also:
